column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Hyɛ Israelmba ma wɔmbrɛ wo  olive   ngo krɔnkrɔn a woesiw a wɔdze sɔ gya
column5: ma wɔmfa nsɔ kandzea nsi do daa."

column2: "Dase ntwamutam no ekyir
column4: na Aaron nsiesie mfi ewimbir nkodu anapa wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa: ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ ebusuasantsen mu."

column2: "Onsiesie nkandzea no wɔ sika mapa kandzeadua a no ho tsew no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa."
"Na fa isiam pa
column3: na fa bi to tatar duebien; efa ebupɛn du mu ebien nyɛ tatar kor."

column2: "Na hyehyɛ no akyerɛpɛn ebien
column4: wɔ sika mapa pon a no ho tsew no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na fa krɔbɔw gyirengyirenn to kyerɛpɛn kor do
column3: ma ɔnyɛ nkaadze wɔ boodoo no do

column2: "Ahomgyeda biara ɔnhyehyɛ no yie wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa: ɔyɛ Israelmba afamu daa ahyɛmu."
"Na ɔnyɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin dze; na wondzi no wɔ mbrɛ ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn a ofi EWURADZE ogya afɔr do ma no wɔ daa ahyɛdze do."
"Na Israelnyi ɔbaa bi ne babanyin a n’egya yɛ Egyptnyi
column3: fiir edzi wɔ Israelmba no mu: na Israelnyi ɔbaa no ne babanyin no ɔnye Israelnyi ɔbanyin bi dzii aperper wɔ nseraban no mu;"

column2: "na Israelnyi ɔbaa no ne babanyin no kaa Dzin no ho ebususɛm
column3: na ɔdomee: na wɔdze no brɛɛ Moses. Na ne na ne dzin dze Selomit
column4: Dibri ne babaa a ofi Dan ebusuakuw mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze no siei
column3: ama woeenya EWURADZE n’anomu asɛm ma wɔaaka akyerɛ hɔn ana."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Fa nyia wɔadom no fir edzi kɔ nseraban no ekyir; na ma hɔn a wɔtsee no nyinara mfa hɔn nsa ngu n’etsifi
column5: na ma mboanofo no nyinara nsiw no abo."

column2: "Na kasa kyerɛ Israelmba dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔdom ne Nyankopɔn no ɔbɔsoa no bɔn."

column2: "Na nyia ɔka EWURADZE ne dzin ho ebususɛm no
column3: oku na wonku no; osiw na mboanofo no nyinara nsiw no abo: ɔhɔho o
column5: sɛ ɔka EWURADZE ne dzin ho ebususɛm a

column2: "Na nyia ɔbɔ nyimpa biara adze ma ɔtɔr no
"na nyia ɔbɔ abowa adze ma owu no ɔnhyɛ ananmu: nkwa nhyɛ nkwa ananmu."
"Na sɛ nyimpa ma ne nyɛnko dzi dzɛm a; dɛ mbrɛ ɔno ɔayɛ no
"Obu nhyɛ obu ananmu
column4: ese nhyɛ ese ananmu: dɛ mbrɛ ɔama nyimpa bi edzi dzɛm no

column2: "Na nyia oku abowa no ɔnhyɛ ananmu: na nyia oku nyimpa no wonku no."
"Mbra kor ara nda hɔ mma hom
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ma ɔhɔho no
column4: ɔnyɛ dɛmara mma okuromnyi no: na emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba
column3: na wɔdze nyia ɔdomee no fiir edzi kɔr nseraban no ekyir
column4: na wosiiw no abo. Na Israelmba yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
